quest.name: A Brewing Reputation
journal:
Stigma-4 would spread word of the Last Dregs far and wide.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
objectives: Spread word of the Last Dregs.

dialogue.name: STIGMA4
dialogue.text: The Last Dregs' performance is currently satisfactory, but analysis indicates that a focus on spreading awareness of the café's presence would yield even greater results.

dialogue.name: STIGMA4
dialogue.text: Therefore, you are requested to make use of your vocal aperture to engage in persuasive conversation with other life-forms and secure their patronage.

dialogue.name: STIGMA4
dialogue.text: Commencing Operation: Propagandize Plebeians. Two likely locations of patron encounter have been marked on your map. Venture forth and return victorious.

dialogue.name: EAOMI04610
dialogue.text: Through what pains you meat bags go to prepare and masticate your meals into piles of meaningless mush. Perhaps your corporeal forms derive pleasure from such a horrific process, but I must admit a failure to comprehend the appeal.

dialogue.name: EAOMI04610
dialogue.text: We Ea find the occasional diversion in minute fluctuations of aether, yes. But to gather in a primitive circle of equally barbaric life-forms for an empty exchange of ritual... What a dreadful waste of time.

dialogue.name: EAOMI04610
dialogue.text: The Last Dregs? Yes I know it well! Several of my non-corporeal comrades have already gone to visit, eager to participate in gustatory experimentation. Truth be told, I have been considering making the journey myself, and this was just the push I needed!

dialogue.name: EAOMI04610
dialogue.text: To reacquaint oneself with a sense long forgotten...now that is truly an experience to imbue life with meaning! I quiver with anticipation to see what the future has in store for me and mine.

dialogue.name: DRAGONOMI04610
dialogue.text: ...Dost thou speak to me, little one? Pray be silent, for I cannot abide the chatter of diminutive creatures.

dialogue.name: DRAGONOMI04610
dialogue.text: Thou sayest this “café” is bustling with your like? The mere thought of the cacophony makest the bile rise in my throat...

dialogue.name: DRAGONOMI04610
dialogue.text: I have heard much of this “café.” The whispers that carry across the rift speak of hope incarnate and the lost memory of our Dragonstar reborn.

dialogue.name: DRAGONOMI04610
dialogue.text: How I long to see her peaks... Perhaps these wings may yet bear me over that distance...

dialogue.name: OMICRON04610
dialogue.text: <whirr> To further current objectives, all Omicrons have been informed that the Last Dregs is open for patronage.

dialogue.name: OMICRON04610
dialogue.text: Several units have already been deployed to lend aid to operations. Is your current request in regards to waitstaff or patron insufficiencies? <whirr> Retracting previous query in interest of efficiency. This unit will offer its services as needed to simulate the appearance of a successful small business.

dialogue.name: OMICRON04610
dialogue.text: <whirr> The Last Dregs' reputation grows. Of particular note is the popularity of a drink said to increase Omicron computational capabilities.

dialogue.name: OMICRON04610
dialogue.text: This wondrous beverage is highly regarded in Base Omicron and this unit would like to experience the sensation of enhanced functionality for itself. <whirr> Setting destination for the Last Dregs. Reason for travel: recreation and personal improvement.

dialogue.name: STIGMA4
dialogue.text: Propagandize Plebeians underway. Requesting detailed report of mission objectives.

dialogue.name: STIGMA4
dialogue.text: Success rate unsatisfactory. Persuasion must continue until custom improves.

dialogue.name: STIGMA4
dialogue.text: Success rate mediocre. However, analysis indicates growing interest in the Last Dregs. Allied life-form Forename's strategic and charismatic capabilities evaluated as “minimally competent.”

dialogue.name: STIGMA4
dialogue.text: Success rate surpasses projected results. Converted clientele reliably patronize the Last Dregs and clamor enthusiastically for fluid intake. Café status officially designated as “trending.”

dialogue.name: STIGMA4
dialogue.text: This mission will never cease, so long as life-forms remain who have yet to hear the name “The Last Dregs.” May this stipend meet your biological needs until your services are requested again.
